General.Name: Turcas Petrol AS
General.Description: Turcas Petrol A.S. operates as an oil and energy-focused investment company in Turkey. It operates through Oil and Electricity segments. The company's products include fuel, lubricants, and engine oil. It is also involved in the generation of power. The company was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Turcas Petrol A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Aksoy Girisimcilik Enerji Ve Turizm A.S.
General.Address: Ahi Evran Caddesi No: 6, Istanbul, Turkey, 34398
